10: Lower logic: idle
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: Lower logic: start
10_s2: Lower logic: Initial setting
10_s2_e0: [Attack] Damage lower logic reset setting
10_s2_e1: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s2_e2: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s3: Lower logic: rejoicing
10_s3_w0: [Attack] Melee attack
10_s4: Lower logic: wait
